generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and arrows, which is the main surface for vehicle movement.
- sidewalk: A pedestrian walkway is visible on the right side of the road, separated by a curb, and a person is walking on it.
- building: Multiple buildings line both sides of the street, including commercial structures with signage.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the street, particularly on the right side and in the distance.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, showing a partly cloudy condition.
- person: Several people are visible on the left sidewalk near a white van, and one person is walking on the right sidewalk.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road, including a dark-colored car directly in front of the viewpoint and others further ahead and to the sides.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the right sidewalk near the building entrance.
- pole: A tall cylindrical pole with an advertisement is visible on the right side of the road.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on the right side of the road, near the sidewalk.
- terrain: Grass and small patches of vegetation are visible along the curb on the right side of the road.
